attributes.action: A national memorial day to celebrate those we lost from Covid and other causes.
attributes.additional_details: We couldn't see them in hospitals/care homes before we lost them, we couldn't attend their funerals, we couldn't grieve for them as families and friends. Their lives deserve to be celebrated and marked with a show of national respect.
attributes.background: Set aside a day when shops, schools and businesses are closed and we can celebrate their lives and grieve for them at national memorial event(s) and in local or even family gatherings.
